a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem. It captures the extent to which people are free from
government torture, political killings, and forced labor; they have property rights; and enjoy the freedoms of
movement, religion, expression, and association. The variable ranges from 0 to 1 (most rights).
